AsynchResult  
Base64 Encode/decode byte arrays into base64 strings.
IdentifiableObjectInputStream Restores Java objects from the underlying stream by using the classloader returned from the call to given IClassLoaderMapper with the Namespace/ID specified by the associated IdentifiableObjectOutputStream.
IdentifiableObjectOutputStream Stores Java objects in the underlying stream in an manner that allows corresponding input stream to use ID to lookup appropriate associated classloader (via IClassLoaderMapper).
